title: Vietnam - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Vietnam stands at BB+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Vietnam was last set at Ba2 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Vietnam was last reported at BB with positive outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Vietnam thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Vietnam as reported by major credit rating agencies.
